text: Cheng Siwei (June 1935 - 12 July 2015) was a Chinese politician and economist. He was the Chairman of China Soft Science Research Association; President of the Chinese Society for Management Modernization; Director of the Research Center on Fictitious Economy and Data Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences; Dean of the School of Management of the Graduate University of the Chinese Academy of Sciences; and Honorary President of East China University of Science and Technology. Siwei died on the morning of 12 July 2015 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:21st- century Chinese politicians Category:Chinese economists Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Cheng Siwei
